title: Peaches on toast
directions: Cut up peach slices in bite size pieces.
Pore juice and and peaches in sauce pan
Sprinkle cinnamon sugar (about 1 tablespoon) and bring to a boil
Mix 2 tablespoons cornstarch with 2 tablespoons cold water and pour slowly into peaches; the mixture will thicken fast
ingredients: 1 large can sliced peaches in heavy juice / syrup
